item.title: DSCAS does 2D registration
item.author: cpbotha@cpbotha.net (Charl P. Botha)
item.description: The code is just short of being awe-inspiringly horrible, but it works and is quite usable for automatic and semi-automatic rigid registration of 2D sections for 3D reconstruction. See the screenshot below:
item.content:encoded:
The code is just short of being awe-inspiringly horrible, but it works and is quite usable for automatic and semi-automatic rigid registration of 2D sections for 3D reconstruction.

See the screenshot below:
